segment.source: Checklist Implementing a Basic Firewall Policy Design (Windows 10)
segment.target: Checklist Implementing a Basic Firewall Policy Design (Windows 10)

segment.source: Checklist Implementing a Basic Firewall Policy Design
segment.target: Checklist Implementing a Basic Firewall Policy Design

segment.source: Checklist: Implementing a Basic Firewall Policy Design
segment.target: Checklist: Implementing a Basic Firewall Policy Design

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview
segment.target: Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview

segment.source: This parent checklist includes cross-reference links to important concepts about the basic firewall policy design.
segment.target: This parent checklist includes cross-reference links to important concepts about the basic firewall policy design.

segment.source: It also contains links to subordinate checklists that will help you complete the tasks that are required to implement this design.
segment.target: It also contains links to subordinate checklists that will help you complete the tasks that are required to implement this design.

segment.source: Note: Complete the tasks in this checklist in order.
segment.target: Note: Complete the tasks in this checklist in order.

segment.source: When a reference link takes you to a procedure, return to this topic after you complete the steps in that procedure so that you can proceed with the remaining tasks in this checklist.
segment.target: When a reference link takes you to a procedure, return to this topic after you complete the steps in that procedure so that you can proceed with the remaining tasks in this checklist.

segment.source: The procedures in this section use the Group Policy MMC snap-in interfaces to configure the GPOs, but you can also use Windows PowerShell.
segment.target: The procedures in this section use the Group Policy MMC snap-in interfaces to configure the GPOs, but you can also use Windows PowerShell.

segment.source: For more info, see Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Administration with Windows PowerShell.
segment.target: For more info, see Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Administration with Windows PowerShell.

segment.source: Checklist: Implementing a basic firewall policy design
segment.target: Checklist: Implementing a basic firewall policy design

segment.source: Task
segment.target: Task

segment.source: Reference
segment.target: Reference

segment.source: Review important concepts and examples for the basic firewall policy design to determine if this design meets the needs of your organization.
segment.target: Review important concepts and examples for the basic firewall policy design to determine if this design meets the needs of your organization.

segment.source: Identifying Your Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Deployment Goals
segment.target: Identifying Your Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Deployment Goals

segment.source: Basic Firewall Policy Design
segment.target: Basic Firewall Policy Design

segment.source: Firewall Policy Design Example
segment.target: Firewall Policy Design Example

segment.source: Planning Settings for a Basic Firewall Policy
segment.target: Planning Settings for a Basic Firewall Policy

segment.source: Create the membership group and a GPO for each set of devices that require different firewall rules.
segment.target: Create the membership group and a GPO for each set of devices that require different firewall rules.

segment.source: Where GPOs will be similar, such as for Windows 10 and Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview, create one GPO, configure it by using the tasks in this checklist, and then make a copy of the GPO for the other version of Windows.
segment.target: Where GPOs will be similar, such as for Windows 10 and Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview, create one GPO, configure it by using the tasks in this checklist, and then make a copy of the GPO for the other version of Windows.

segment.source: For example, create and configure the GPO for Windows 10, make a copy of it for Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview, and then follow the steps in this checklist to make the few required changes to the copy.
segment.target: For example, create and configure the GPO for Windows 10, make a copy of it for Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview, and then follow the steps in this checklist to make the few required changes to the copy.

segment.source: Checklist: Creating Group Policy Objects
segment.target: Checklist: Creating Group Policy Objects

segment.source: Copy a GPO to Create a New GPO
segment.target: Copy a GPO to Create a New GPO

segment.source: If you are working on a GPO that was copied from another, modify the group membership and WMI filters so that they are correct for the devices for which this GPO is intended.
segment.target: If you are working on a GPO that was copied from another, modify the group membership and WMI filters so that they are correct for the devices for which this GPO is intended.

segment.source: Modify GPO Filters to Apply to a Different Zone or Version of Windows
segment.target: Modify GPO Filters to Apply to a Different Zone or Version of Windows

segment.source: Configure the GPO with firewall default settings appropriate for your design.
segment.target: Configure the GPO with firewall default settings appropriate for your design.

segment.source: Checklist: Configuring Basic Firewall Settings
segment.target: Checklist: Configuring Basic Firewall Settings

segment.source: Create one or more inbound firewall rules to allow unsolicited inbound network traffic.
segment.target: Create one or more inbound firewall rules to allow unsolicited inbound network traffic.

segment.source: Checklist: Creating Inbound Firewall Rules
segment.target: Checklist: Creating Inbound Firewall Rules

segment.source: Create one or more outbound firewall rules to block unwanted outbound network traffic.
segment.target: Create one or more outbound firewall rules to block unwanted outbound network traffic.

segment.source: Checklist: Creating Outbound Firewall Rules
segment.target: Checklist: Creating Outbound Firewall Rules

segment.source: Link the GPO to the domain level of the Active Directory organizational unit hierarchy.
segment.target: Link the GPO to the domain level of the Active Directory organizational unit hierarchy.

segment.source: Link the GPO to the Domain
segment.target: Link the GPO to the Domain

segment.source: Add test devices to the membership group, and then confirm that the devices receive the firewall rules from the GPOs as expected.
segment.target: Add test devices to the membership group, and then confirm that the devices receive the firewall rules from the GPOs as expected.

segment.source: Add Test Devices to the Membership Group for a Zone
segment.target: Add Test Devices to the Membership Group for a Zone

segment.source: According to the testing and roll-out schedule in your design plan, add device accounts to the membership group to deploy the completed firewall policy settings to your devices.
segment.target: According to the testing and roll-out schedule in your design plan, add device accounts to the membership group to deploy the completed firewall policy settings to your devices.

segment.source: Add Production Devices to the Membership Group for a Zone
segment.target: Add Production Devices to the Membership Group for a Zone
